text: geudeul-i daedabhadoe jeohuineun dangsin-i jeohuiege imhagi jeon-edo geuligo jeohuiege dolaehan ihuedo baghaeleul bad-a wassseubnida hani geuga ileugil neohuideul-ui junimkkeseo neohuideul ui jeogdeul-eul myeolmangkehayeo neohuilo ha yeogeum geu daeji wieseo tongchihage ha lila geuleon hu geubunkkeseo neohuiga haeng dongham-eul jikyeobosilila
